privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.s1_text: Welcome to SBA Interactive. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose your personal data when you visit our website or use our services.
privacy.s2_text: We collect information that you provide directly to us when you fill out forms, request quotes, or contact us. This may include:
privacy.s2_li4: Technical information (IP address, browser type) via cookies
privacy.s3_text: We use the collected information for various purposes, including:
privacy.s3_li2: Responding to your inquiries and providing quotes
privacy.s3_li3: Improving our website performance and user experience
privacy.s4_text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, loss, or theft. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
privacy.contact_text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.s1_text: By accessing or using the services provided by SBA Interactive, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
terms.s2_text: SBA Interactive provides web development, design, and digital consulting services. The specific scope of work for each project will be defined in a separate agreement or statement of work.
terms.s3_text: Unless otherwise agreed in writing, all source code, designs, and content developed for a client will become the property of the client upon final payment. SBA Interactive retains the right to use non-confidential portions of the work in our portfolio.
terms.s4_text: A deposit is typically required before work begins. Final payment is due upon project completion or as scheduled in the project agreement. We reserve the right to suspend work or withhold delivery until payment is received.
terms.s5_text: SBA Interactive shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use our services.
terms.contact_text: For any legal inquiries regarding our terms, please email:

showcase.hotel_desc: Immersive video backgrounds and elegant, high-end booking UI.

support.subtitle: Our dedicated team of professionals is always here to ensure your digital success, with a smile.
support.benefit_1_desc: We're always here when you need us most.
support.benefit_2_desc: Real humans, real expertise, real fast.

graphics.subtitle: We don't just build sites - We curate visual experiences. From premium stock selection to bespoke logo design and professional photo retouching.
graphics.benefit_1_desc: Every pixel polished. We enhance your existing photos to meet elite standards.
graphics.benefit_2_desc: Custom logos and identity systems that make your brand unmistakable.
graphics.benefit_3_desc: Finding the perfect stock assets that don't feel like stock.

wordpress.title: Elite WordPress Development
wordpress.subtitle: Beyond templates. We engineer high-performance, secure, and scalable WordPress platforms tailored to your brand.
wordpress.seo_title: Custom WordPress Development Services - SBA Interactive
wordpress.seo_desc: Expert custom WordPress development. We build secure, high-speed, and scalable WordPress websites that drive growth.
wordpress.content_intro: Forget everything you know about bloated, slow WordPress sites. Our approach to WordPress development treats the CMS as a powerful application framework, not just a blogging tool. We strip away unnecessary plugins and build lean, custom themes that load instantly and rank higher.
wordpress.benefit_1_desc: Pixel-perfect implementation of your design, without relying on heavy page builders.
wordpress.benefit_2_desc: Decouple the frontend for ultimate speed and security using Astro or Next.js.
wordpress.benefit_3_desc: Achieve 90+ Core Web Vitals scores with our optimization techniques.

custom.title: Bespoke Web Applications
custom.subtitle: Turning visionary concepts into robust, scalable digital reality.
custom.seo_title: Custom Web App Development Services - SBA Interactive
custom.seo_desc: Full-cycle custom web application development. React, Vue, Svelte solutions for complex business needs.
custom.content_intro: When off-the-shelf software falls short, we step in. Our custom web development service is designed for ambitious businesses that need unique functionality. We architect solutions from the ground up using modern frameworks like React, Svelte, and Astro to ensure your application is fast, secure, and future-proof.
custom.benefit_1_desc: Built to handle growth, from thousands to millions of users.
custom.benefit_2_desc: Leveraging the latest technologies for superior performance and developer experience.
custom.benefit_3_desc: Connect with any third-party API or legacy system effortlessly.

advanced.title: SaaS & Digital Products
advanced.subtitle: From MVP to Enterprise Scale: We build software that means business.
advanced.seo_title: SaaS & Digital Product Development - SBA Interactive
advanced.seo_desc: End-to-end SaaS development services. We build rigorous, scalable, and user-centric digital products.
advanced.content_intro: Launching a digital product requires more than just code; it requires a strategic partner. We specialize in building SaaS platforms that are secure, compliant, and user-friendly. From initial architecture to deployment and maintenance, we handle the entire product lifecycle with engineering precision.
advanced.benefit_1_desc: Validate your ideas quickly with high-fidelity MVPs.
advanced.benefit_2_desc: Enterprise-grade security standards built into the core.
advanced.benefit_3_desc: Integrated dashboards to track user behavior and KPIs.

mobile.title: Mobile-First Experiences
mobile.subtitle: Flawless performance on every screen, every time.
mobile.seo_title: Responsive Mobile Web Design Services - SBA Interactive
mobile.seo_desc: Create engaging mobile experiences. Responsive design that adapts perfectly to smartphones, tablets, and desktops.
mobile.content_intro: In a mobile-first world, your digital presence is only as good as its smallest screen. We don't just 'shrink' desktop sites; we re-imagine the user journey for touch interfaces. Our responsive designs ensure that navigation is intuitive, images are optimized, and interactions are fluid across all devices.
mobile.benefit_1_desc: Interfaces designed for thumbs, ensuring effortless navigation.
mobile.benefit_2_desc: Content that reflows intelligently based on screen real estate.
mobile.benefit_3_desc: A unified brand experience whether on iOS, Android, or desktop.

seo.title: SEO & Performance Engineering
seo.subtitle: Dominate search rankings with technical superiority.
seo.seo_title: Technical SEO & Performance Optimization - SBA Interactive
seo.seo_desc: Boost your search rankings and site speed. Advanced technical SEO and Core Web Vitals optimization services.
seo.content_intro: Visibility isn't luck; it's engineering. Search engines today prioritize user experience, speed, and technical stability. Our SEO services dive deep into the code, optimizing server response times, structuring data with schema markup, and ensuring your site is crawlable and indexable by the latest algorithms.
seo.benefit_1_desc: Comprehensive analysis of your site's health and indexability.
seo.benefit_2_desc: Code splitting, image compression, and caching strategies for instant loads.
seo.benefit_3_desc: HTML5 semantic markup that helps search engines understand your content.

design.title: UI/UX Design
design.subtitle: Crafting digital experiences that captivate and convert.
design.seo_desc: Award-winning UI/UX design. We create beautiful, intuitive interfaces that drive user engagement and conversion.
design.content_intro: Design is the silent ambassador of your brand. We move beyond aesthetics to create user-centric interfaces that solve problems. value. Our process involves user research, wireframing, and interactive prototyping to ensure that every pixel serves a purpose and guides the user toward conversion.
design.benefit_1_desc: Decisions backed by user research and behavior analysis.
design.benefit_2_desc: Scalable component libraries for consistent branding.
design.benefit_3_desc: Experience the flow and feel of your product before writing a line of code.
